description: Network Error Logging (NEL) is used to instruct the browser to report network errors to a specified endpoint. The header contains a JSON object defining reporting parameters.

response-directives.description: Specifies the reporting group where network error reports should be sent.
Lifetime of the policy in seconds.
Whether the policy applies to all subdomains of the origin.
Percentage of successful network requests that should be reported (0.0-1.0).
Percentage of failed network requests that should be reported (0.0-1.0).
